TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestWrapper extends System.Web.HttpRequestBase

summary.span: 封装 HTTP 内部对象，该对象使 ASP.NET 可以读取客户端在 Web 请求过程中发送的 HTTP 值。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并作为包装器类。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开的功能类并公开类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class and exposes the type. 类使您能够替换的原始实现使用自定义实现，如当你执行单元测试 ASP.NET 管道外部应用程序中的类。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

public: HttpRequestWrapper(System::Web::HttpRequest ^ httpRequest);

param.span: 可使用此包装类进行访问的对象。

span.span: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.

summary.span: 使用指定的请求对象初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified request object.
is .

Public Overrides Sub Abort ()

summary.span: 强制地终止基础 TCP 连接，会导致任何显著的 I/O 失败。

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是线程安全的。This method is thread-safe. 任何线程可能随时对它进行调用。Any thread may call it at any time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回当前正在执行的页处理程序的文件路径。The property returns the file path of the currently executing page handler. 当你重定向使用的请求方法或方法，属性返回到 （子页） 将你重定向页的路径。When you redirect a request using either the method or the method, the property returns the path of the page that you are redirecting to (the child page).

summary.span: 获取可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.

returns.span: 可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 对象。

span.span: A object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等同于之处在于它还将读取的字节复制到 ASP.NET 用于填充内部存储， ，和属性。This method is identical to except that it also copies the bytes that are read to the internal storage that is used by ASP.NET to populate the , , and properties. 由于保留了此信息，如 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面(.aspx 文件)这样的下游代码将成功运行。Because this information is preserved, downstream code such as ASP.NET Web Forms pages (.aspx files) will run successfully. 这不同于使用 方法的情况。This is not the case with the method.

Docs.exception:
已加载和分析请求的实体主体。
The request's entity body has already been loaded and parsed.
导致加载和分析实体正文的属性的示例包括：
Examples of properties that cause the entity body to be loaded and parsed include the following:
- 属性。The property.
- 属性。The property.
- 属性。The property.
- 方法。The method.要避免此异常，请首先调用 方法。To avoid this exception, call the method first.如果客户在实体正文读取时断开连接，则也会引发此异常。This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.

summary.span: 获取可用于读取传入的 HTTP 实体主体的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateInput ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateInput ()
public: override void ValidateInput();

summary.span: 引发对通过 、 和 属性访问的集合的验证。

span.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用的输入的验证标志以确定是否对请求访问集合中，通过执行验证， ，和属性。The class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the , , and properties. 方法设置这些标志这样，当`get`访问器， ，或调用属性、 输入验证。The method sets these flags so that when the `get` accessors of the , , or properties are invoked, input validation is performed. 验证工作原理是检查所有输入的数据与潜在的危险数据的硬编码列表。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.
